leaveApplication.title: Apply Leave
leaveApplication.includeWeekendsDescription1: Will calculate all days between start and end dates (including Saturdays and Sundays)
leaveApplication.includeWeekendsDescription2: Only calculate working days (Monday to Friday), Saturdays and Sundays will not be counted
leaveApplication.excludePublicHolidaysDescription1: Public holidays will be excluded when calculating leave days
leaveApplication.excludePublicHolidaysDescription2: Public holidays will be included when calculating leave days
leaveApplication.attachFilesTitle: Attachments (Optional, supports PDF, JPEG, JPG, TIFF and other image formats, each file max 5MB)
leaveApplication.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
leaveApplication.overlapWarningTitle: You have the following pending or approved leave in this date range
leaveApplication.overlapWarningMessage: Submission is blocked. Please change the dates or sessions so there is no overlap, then try again.
leaveApplication.documentRequirementNotice: For any sick leave, jury service leave, marriage leave, maternity leave, paternity leave, work injury sick leave and compassionate leave, supporting documents are required. If you are unable to submit the documents at the time of application, the Company may, at its discretion, grant the leave on a provisional basis, which will only become effective upon receipt of the relevant supporting documents. The Company reserves the right to revoke any leave without valid supporting documents.

leaveHistory.title: Leave History
leaveHistory.confirmReversalMessage: Are you sure you want to apply for reversal? This will create a reversal application that requires approval.
leaveHistory.searchPlaceholder: Search transaction ID, leave type or applicant...

leaveBalance.title: Leave Balance
leaveBalance.resignationNotice: When an employee submits a resignation application, their leave entitlements will be calculated exactly as is, and rounding will not be applied

employeeDocuments.title: My Documents
employeeDocuments.description: You can view and download documents issued to you by HR here
employeeDocuments.noPermissionFile: You do not have permission to view this file
employeeDocuments.cannotPreview: Cannot preview this file type in browser
employeeDocuments.mobilePdfMessage: PDF files cannot be previewed directly on mobile devices. Please download or open in a new window.
employeeDocuments.disclaimer: Documents might accompanied by a password encryption comprising the first 5 alphanumeric characters of your Hong Kong ID, your complete English surname, and last 2 digits of your year of birth. For example, if your Hong Kong identity card number is A123456(7), your English surname is CHAO, and your date of birth is 1998-05-09, then your password would be A1234CHAO98. Please keep your personal information confidential and never provide it to any party.

adminPaperFlow.title: Paper Flow Leave Application (System Administrator Only)
adminPaperFlow.description: This page is used to enter paper leave applications on behalf of employees. Applications will be directly approved and balance deducted without going through the electronic approval process.
adminPaperFlow.searchUserPlaceholder: Search by employee number, name or alias
adminPaperFlow.searchLeaveTypePlaceholder: Search by leave type name or code
adminPaperFlow.uploadPaperOrPhoto: Upload Paper Application or Photo Files (Optional)
adminPaperFlow.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
adminPaperFlow.applicationSubmitted: Paper Flow application submitted and approved, Transaction ID: {{transactionId}}
adminPaperFlow.includeWeekendsDescription1: Will calculate all days between start and end dates (including Saturdays and Sundays)
adminPaperFlow.includeWeekendsDescription2: Only calculate working days (Monday to Friday), Saturdays and Sundays will not be counted
adminPaperFlow.excludePublicHolidaysDescription1: Public holidays will be excluded when calculating leave days
adminPaperFlow.excludePublicHolidaysDescription2: Public holidays will be included when calculating leave days

schedule.startTimeHelper: You can enter HH:mm format or 4 digits (e.g., 2330), hour range 0-32
schedule.endTimeHelper: You can enter HH:mm format or 4 digits (e.g., 2600), hour range 0-32, e.g., 26:00 means 2:00 AM next day
schedule.invalidStartTime: Invalid start time format (hour range: 0-32, minute range: 0-59)
schedule.invalidStartTimeFormat: Invalid start time format, please use HH:mm format (e.g., 23:30) or 4 digits (e.g., 2330)
schedule.invalidEndTime: Invalid end time format (hour range: 0-32, minute range: 0-59)
schedule.invalidEndTimeFormat: Invalid end time format, please use HH:mm format (e.g., 26:00) or 4 digits (e.g., 2600)
schedule.checkerDateOutOfRange: This date is outside the checker editable range (edits allowed only within the specified date range, UTC+8)
schedule.confirmEnableAllCheckerEdit: Are you sure you want to enable Checker edit permission for all groups?

attendance.missingAttendanceDate: Missing attendance date information, please select again

attendance.notEligibleForAttendanceBonus: Not eligible for attendance bonus this month
attendance.noMonthlySummaryHint: After selecting employee, year and month, the system will automatically copy from attendance and calculate late minutes, break duration, total work hours, overtime and accrued OT. You do not need to generate a report first. If no data appears, ensure the employee is assigned to a department group.
